result.longName: Centre Testing International Group Co. Ltd.

assetProfile.address2: 101 Building 1 Xingdong Community, Xin'an Street Bao'an District
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Centre Testing International Group Co. Ltd. provides testing, inspection, certification, calibration, audit, training, and technical services in China and internationally. It operates through five segments: Trade Assurance, Consumer Product Testing, Industrial Testing, Life Science, and Pharmaceutical and Medical Services. The company provides environmental protection and regulatory; in-vehicle electronic; vehicle and parts; automotive materials; connection fastener; rail transit; hazardous materials on ships testing; aviation materials; special equipment; baby and child toy; home life; furniture and furniture materials; food contact material; tableware and kitchenware test; automotive electronic; medical device; electromagnetic compatibility; safety regulations; engineering on-site monitoring and measurement; on-site physical testing; building material testing; hot package testing; special project; product type inspection; textile and garment testing; lubricant oil condition monitoring; chemical product testing; metal material; polymer materials; food contact material; green environmental testing; occupational and public health; and environmental testing services. It also offers CE certification, system certification, service certification, and product certification services; and consumer product inspection, wind power equipment manufacturing supervision, wind turbine inspection, industrial product inspection, non-destructive testing, foundation-based testing, engineering on-site monitoring and measurement, luxury goods inspection, pest control, bulk commodity inspection, and government-entrusted inspection services. The company serves various industries, including consumer goods, medical, electronics & electrical products, automotive & parts, food & agricultural products, construction & building materials, fuel, rail, and marine & aviation. Centre Testing International Group Co. Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
